channel.title: bitbake on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in bitbake on Morgoth

item.title: BitBake
item.description: BitBake bitbake是类似于make的构建工具，主要用于OpenEmbedded和yocto构建linux发行版. https://github.com/openembedded/bitbake bitbake: $ bitbake python -c devshell/devpyshell $ bitbake python -c clean/cleanall/cleanstate $ bitbake python
